## Documentation Issue

What documentation is missing, incorrect, or unclear?

## Location

Where is (or should be) the documentation?

- File: [e.g., `docs/30-system-architecture-overview.md`]
- Section: [e.g., "Data Flow" section]

## Issue Type

- [ ] Missing documentation
- [ ] Incorrect/outdated information
- [ ] Unclear explanation
- [ ] Typo/grammar
- [ ] Code example doesn't work
- [ ] Other (specify):

## Description

Describe the issue in detail.

## Expected Documentation

What should the documentation say or include?

## Proposed Changes

If you have suggestions for how to fix this, please share them.

## Additional Context

Any other relevant information.

## Willing to Help?

- [ ] I can submit a PR to fix this
- [ ] I can provide more details if needed
- [ ] I can only report the issue
